resources.string: Interskol Drill provides excellent control, which is guaranteed by an electronic speed control system. Among other things, you can take advantage of a reliable and convenient switch manufactured by Holland. The handle is very ergonomic, it is convenient when performing a large amount of work and effectively reduces operator fatigue.

Makita has long been known as one of the leading power tool brands on the market. The brand carries a very well-rounded series with different models to choose from. Drills can be divided into two categories; corded and cordless drills.

DeWALT Drill and grinders come equipped with the Anti-Rotation E-CLUTCH® System. Compared to standard clutches, E-CLUTCH® helps minimize sudden torque reaction in drills by detecting the motion of the tool and shutting it down in bind-up situations. In grinders, E-CLUTCH® shuts the motor down in under a tenth of a second when a pinch/stall is detected.
